title: Because who can report bugs on reddit?
body:
Server: NA
Type of Bug: Client Bug
Description: I have no sejuani skin,but i traded with someone for the champ in the client and i played with a skin. I believe it could be replicated by swapping champs after skin is locked in and minimized, then champ traded.
Video / Screenshot: n/a
Steps to reproduce: Get friend to pick champ for you that they have skin on. Swap champs after locked in and skin minimized.
Expected result: Have skin. It was Fiora to Sejuani.
Observed result: Haven't tried it again.
Reproduction rate: 0/10
System specs: HD 6870, AMD Octacore Processor

replies.body:
Hey FortitudoAcer,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
